content:
I want to drop a note here for future reference.

A thread in #implementers : FHIR on AWS

A Dec. 2019 post on the AWS public sector blog Patient-centered health: How AWS helps patients take control of their own health data, which links to some earlier ones.

I'm particularly interested in this from a #patient empowerment perspective because of the high potential leverage in the Amazon/Chase/Berkshire "Haven" health company. Essentially, I imagine a key factor encouraging consumer adoption will be availability of infrastructure, and if Amazon (in some shape or form) provides the health data spigot I want, it might be great.

(Thoughts are welcome of course ... am I stating the obvious, or guilty of wishful thinking, or...?)
